channel.title: Master's Student on Gioele La Manno
channel.description: Recent content in Master's Student on Gioele La Manno

item.title: Daniil Bobrovskiy
item.description: Short Bio I am a Master’s student in the Life Sciences Engineering program at EPFL. Prior to arriving at EPFL, I completed four years of the six-year program in Bioengineering and Bioinformatics at the Lomonosov Moscow State University. My engagement with La Manno lab began in 2021 when I had the privilege of joining as a grant recipient of the Zimin Foundation - SMTB Alumni Summer Research Program. The following year, I officially joined the La Manno lab team as a student research assistant.
